data: The event Client Quarterly Review was about reviewing quarterly performance metrics with the client
The event Client Quarterly Review included discussions on 12% revenue growth compared to the previous quarter
The event Client Quarterly Review included discussions on strong performance in the APAC region
The event Client Quarterly Review included discussions on a 3% reduction in customer churn
The event Client Quarterly Review produced a decision to increase APAC marketing efforts
The event Client Quarterly Review produced a decision to implement churn reduction initiatives
The event Client Quarterly Review generated an action item to prepare an APAC campaign plan
The event Client Quarterly Review generated an action item to set customer churn KPI targets
